content: row 11 or final row if size adjusted of the same middle panel you should be able to place this full panel across your chest and have both armpits fit comfortably in the arm holes see images assembling the pillow keeping the joining seams on the outside stitch the two full panels together along all edges leaving the longest straight edge unstitched flip the pillow right way out so that all of the seaming and loose ends are on the inside you can also weave in the loose end as needed afterwards using fiberfill stuff the outer arms and chest flap to a roughly even firmness/depth stitch together the longest edge leaving enough room to finish stuffing the body of the pillow add fiberfill evenly to desired firmness finish stitching and weaving in any remaining ends enjoy and heal well <3
